img_text: WILLBILLy The 10 COMMANDMENTS 1. Ain't but One God. 2. Honor yer Ma and Pa. tales or gossipin 3. No tellin't 4. Git yer hide ta Sunday meetin 5. Ain't nothin' come before the Lord. 6. No foolin' with another fellers gal. 7. No killin', sept fer critters. 8. Quit yer foul mouthin. 9. No swipin' yer kin folks stuff. 10. Don't be hankering' fer it neither.
